name: Ripgates: 2D Portal Tribute(alpha)
description:
EARLY PRE-PRE-ALPHA! MAY BE BUGGY!

This is my first game and a tribute to one of my all-time favorite games, Portal by Valve. This game is a 2-D spin-off with many cloned elements and a few unique twists. One of such quirks is the limited supply of portals which can be topped up at any save station.  There is, so far, a small test campaign which may or may not change moving forward. Test campaign takes about 30 mins - 1 hour so far but will expand as time goes on. The game is intended to be presented as a Metroidvania-style title with progression focused around the collection of various power-ups that increase the mobility of your character in order to reach new paths that were otherwise inaccessible.

Features a (mostly)functional  room editor that allows you to make and test your own rooms. I did my best to try and label everything in a logical manner with tool-tips when necessary. These tool-tips can be turned off with the H key.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D To Move
  • Q To Interact With Buttons/Switches/Save Stations
  • E To Pickup Boxes/Balls
  • SPACEBAR To Jump
  • W/S To Climb Ladders
  • SPACEBAR To Dismount Ladders
  • LEFT/RIGHT CLICK To Shoot Portals (With Portal Device)
  • SCROLLWHEEL UP/DOWN To Switch Between Gun And Portal Device
  • LEFT CONTROL To Look Around & Laser Sight

DEV MODE CONTROLS:  (subject to change or sudden removal)

  • U To Refill Portal Energy Anywhere Anytime
  • 9/0 Change Gun Upgrade Level
  • O/P Change Portal Device Upgrade Level
  • K/L Change Glove Upgrade Level
  • M Toggle Fall Protection Upgrade
  • N Toggle High Jump Upgrade
  • B Toggle Black Tile Override Upgrade
  • V Toggle Portal Shifter Upgrade (shift to use. lays portals with opposite facing)
  • C Toggle Override Upgrade (currently defunct)
  • X Toggle Spikeproof Shoes Upgrade
  • Z Toggle Cheapshot Upgrade
  • T Toggle Super Slow Frame Rate

I try to update this pretty often with new features and changes to the campaign. If you have any questions, comments, bugs, or issues then please feel free to notify me in the discussion thread below.
